alert.note: Alert for Hanson; Hutchinson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 08 at 2:11AM MDT until September 08 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM CDT THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTH-CENTRAL AND SOUTHEASTERN SOUTH DAKOTA... The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM CDT this morning through this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Hanson and Hutchinson. * WINDS...At first, southwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. Heading into the afternoon hours, expect winds to decrease as a cold front moves through which will bring a rapid change to westerly and then northerly winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
